resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/73051</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73051</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>42609397-04f8-4a92-945b-37f20c1995a4#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Vegetatív gerincvelői reflex</string>
            <string language="en">Vegetative reflex of spinal marrow</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vegetativer Reflex des Rückenmarks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réflexe végétatif de moelle épinière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflex vegetative do marrow spinal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflesso vegetativo di midollo spinale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυτική αντανάκλαση του νωτιαίου κολοκυθιού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflejo vegetativo del tuétano espinal</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az ingerület terjedése egy vegetatív gerincvelői reflexben</string>
            <string language="en">Spreading of excitation in spinal marrow's vegetative reflex</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">idegrendszer,  reflexív,  reflexkör,  gerincvelő,  elülső sazrv,  hátsó szarv,  </string>
            <string language="en">nervous system, reflex arc, reflex cycle, spinal marrow, frontal horn, hinder horn</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbreiten von Erregung im vegetativen Reflex des 
Rückenmarks</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Propagation de l'excitation dans le réflexe 
végétatif de la moelle épinière</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Espalhar da excitação no reflex vegetative de 
marrow spinal</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Diffusione dell'eccitazione nel riflesso 
vegetativo del midollo spinale</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάδοση της διέγερσης στη φυτική αντανάκλαση του 
νωτιαίου κολοκυθιού</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El separarse de la excitación en el reflejo 
vegetativo del tuétano espinal</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">nervöses System, Reflexbogen, Reflexschleife, 
Rückenmark, frontales Horn, hindern Horn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le système nerveux, arc réflexe, cycle réflexe, 
moelle épinière, klaxon frontal, gênent le klaxon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o sistema nervoso, arco reflexo, ciclo reflexo, marrow 
spinal, chifre frontal, hinder o chifre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">il sistema nervoso, l'arco riflesso, il ciclo riflesso,
il midollo spinale, corno frontale, ostacola il corno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">το νευρικό σύστημα, ανακλαστικό τόξο, ανακλαστικός κύκλος,
νωτιαίο κολοκύθι, μετωπικό κέρατο, εμποδίζει το κέρατο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el sistema nervioso, arco reflejo, ciclo reflejo, 
tuétano espinal, cuerno frontal, obstaculiza el cuerno</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>73051</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=42609397-04f8-4a92-945b-37f20c1995a4&v=1&b=2</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
